verses.verse: Now <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H8334>minister,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> is <S%H4191>dead;<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore <S%H6965>arise,<s%> go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> do <S%H5414>give<s%> to them, even to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Every <S%H3605><s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of your <S%H7272>foot<s%> shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> upon, that have I <S%H5414>given<s%> unto you, <S%H834>as<s%> I <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

From the <S%H4480>wilderness<s%> <S%H4057><s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river,<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> toward the going <S%H3996>down<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> your <S%H1366>coast.<s%>

There shall <S%H3808>not<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%> be able to <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H2416>life:<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> I <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> so I will <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee: I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7503>fail<s%> thee, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> thee.

Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of a good <S%H553>courage:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H853>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> shalt <S%H859>thou<s%> divide for an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> them.

Only <S%H7535><s%> be thou <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H553>courageous,<s%> that thou mayest <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee: <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> it to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> thou mayest <S%H7919>prosper<s%> <S%H3605>whithersoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H1980>goest.<s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4185>depart<s%> out of thy <S%H4480>mouth;<s%> <S%H6310><s%> but thou shalt <S%H1897>meditate<s%> therein <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> thou mayest <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> therein: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> thou shalt <S%H6743>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6743>prosperous,<s%> and <S%H227>then<s%> thou shalt have good <S%H7919>success.<s%>

Have <S%H3808>not<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee? Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of a good <S%H553>courage;<s%> be not <S%H6206>afraid,<s%> <S%H408><s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> be thou <S%H2865>dismayed:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5973>with<s%> thee <S%H3605>whithersoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H1980>goest.<s%>

Pass <S%H5674><s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> the <S%H4264>host,<s%> and <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3559>Prepare<s%> you <S%H6720>victuals;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H5750>within<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> shall pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> to go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> you to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

And to the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> and to the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and to <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath given you <S%H5117>rest,<s%> and hath <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

Your <S%H802>wives,<s%> your little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and your <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> shall <S%H3427>remain<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> you on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> but <S%H859>ye<s%> shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H2571>armed,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> and <S%H5826>help<s%> them;

Until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H5117>given<s%> your <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H5117>rest,<s%> as he hath given you, and <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> have <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> them: then ye shall <S%H7725>return<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H3425>possession,<s%> and <S%H3423>enjoy<s%> it, <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> you on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrising.<s%> <S%H8121><s%>

And they <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou <S%H6680>commandest<s%> us we will <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H413>whithersoever<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H7971>sendest<s%> us, we will <S%H1980>go.<s%>

According as we <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>things,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will we <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee: <S%H7535>only<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee, <S%H834>as<s%> he <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Whosoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H834><s%> he be that doth rebel <S%H4784>against<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H6310>commandment,<s%> and will <S%H3808>not<s%> hearken <S%H8085>unto<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1697>words<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou <S%H6680>commandest<s%> him, he shall be put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of a good <S%H553>courage.<s%>
